clues.text: This 2nd cousin of John Adams signed the Declaration of Independence & led resistance to the Tea Act

rounds.text: On June 6, 2018 the Chinese Theatre dimmed its lights to honor Jerry Maren, who lived to the greatest age of any of this 1939 group
